meanings.definition: A written or verbal request inviting someone to go somewhere or to do something.
meanings.sent1: I received an invitation to my friend's birthday party.
meanings.sent2: She sent out invitations for her wedding.
meanings.sent3: The invitation to the picnic made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her invitation to join the book club was like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The elegant invitation to the gala was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The action of inviting someone to go somewhere or to do something.
meanings.sent1: His invitation to the dance was well-received.
meanings.sent2: The invitation to the event was met with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The cat's invitation to play with a ball of yarn was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The invitation to explore the unknown was a call to adventure.
meanings.sent5: The invitation to taste the delicious cake was irresistible.
